channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Best MacBook Accessories We’ve Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: From charging adapters to external monitors, we’ve gathered the essential peripherals for your Apple laptop.

item.title: Perplexity launches its own freemium ‘deep research’ product

item.title: Metals Crucial to Clean Energy Are Getting Caught Up in the US–China Trade War
item.description: After a Chinese export ban, can the US get gallium and germanium from Canada—or will tariffs get in the way?

item.title: Does Chocolate Go Bad? How to Store It, Freeze it, and Ship It
item.description: Chocolate is precious. Here’s how to keep its flavors tasting fresh.

item.title: Best Noise-Canceling Headphones (2025): Over-Ears, Wireless Earbuds, Workout Pairs
item.description: Tune out (or rock out) with our favorite over-ears and earbuds.
